All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractConstraintRemover<T>
The AbstractConstraintRemover.
AbstractFactory<T>
The AbstractFactory.
AbstractIndexedCollection<E>
The AbstractIndexedCollection provides a skeletal implementation of the IndexedCollection interface, to minimize the effort required to implement this interface.
AbstractRandomConstraintRemover<T>
The RandomConstraintRemover.
AbstractState
The AbstractState class serves as a base class for different solver states in the approximation framework.
AddOperationState
The AddOperationState allows to enable or disable the add operation on an IndexedCollection.
ApproximationSolverBuilder
A builder for creating the approximation solver from the command line interface.
ApproximationSolverDecorator
The ApproximationSolverDecorator is a decorator for the Choco solver.
ArrayBasedMap<K,V>
The ArrayBasedMap is a map based on an array of fixed size.
ArrayBasedMapDouble<K>
The ArrayBasedMapDouble is a map of doubles based on an array of fixed size.
ArrayBasedMapHelper<K>
The ArrayBasedMapHelper manages the keys of an array-based map without considering the values, so that this helper can be reused for any type, even primitive ones.
ArrayBasedMapInt<K>
The ArrayBasedMapInt is a map of integers based on an array of fixed size.
ArrayIndexedCollection<E>
The ArrayIndexedCollection implements an IndexedCollection using an array.
BloomFilterable
The BloomFilterable interface allows an object to have multiple hash codes to enable the use of Bloom filters.
BooleanCriteria
A criterion that allows stopping a solving process based on a boolean flag.
CLI
The CLI class is responsible for handling command-line arguments for the Approximation solver.
CLI.SolverKind
The Enum SolverKind.
CollectionFactory
The CollectionFactory provides factory methods instantiating the collections used in the solver.
CollectionManagementStrategy
The CollectionManagementStrategy enables to dynamically determine the best strategy to use to manage a collection.
ConsoleSolverListener
The ConsoleSolverListener.
ConstraintMeasureFactory
The ConstraintMeasureFactory.
ConstraintRemoverFactory
The ConstraintRemoverFactory
DynamicallyManagedIndexedCollection<E>
The DynamicallyManagedIndexedCollection is a decorator to dynamically manage an IndexedCollection.
EmptyCollectionManagementStrategy
The EmptyCollectionManagementStrategy is the strategy used to manage empty collections.
EmptyIndexedCollection<E>
The EmptyIndexedCollection is an unmodifiable implementation of IndexedCollection which does not contain any element.
GroupConstraint
Represents a group of constraints in an approximation solver.
GroupConstraintRemover
The GroupConstraintRemover.
HashQueue<E>
The HashQueue defines a queue with constant-time access to any of its elements.
HashQueue.HashQueueElement<E>
The HashQueueElement represents an element of the HashQueue.
Heap<E>
The Heap is an implementation of a heap allowing to retrieve any of its element efficiently, thanks to index functions.
Heapable
The Heapable interface allows to efficiently retrieve an object in a heap represented with an array.
HeapFactory
The HeapFactory enables to easily create parameterized instances of Heap.
IApproximationSolver
Interface defining an approximation solver.
IConstraintGroupSolver
Interface defining a solver that handles constraint groups.
IConstraintMeasure
Interface defining a measure for evaluating constraints in an approximation solver.
IConstraintsRemover
Interface for removing constraints in an approximation solver.
IndexedCollection<E>
The IndexedCollection is a collection allowing to access its elements by their index.
IndexedCollectionIterator<E>
The IndexedCollectionIterator adds some features to a classical iterator when it is used on an IndexedCollection.
IndexedCollectionIteratorImpl<E>
The IndexedCollectionIterator enables to iterate over an IndexedCollection.
ISolverListener
The ISolverListener interface defines a set of callback methods that can be implemented to track the state and progress of a solver.
ISolverState
Represents the state of a solver during the solving process.
KeepFalsifiedConstraintStrategy
The KeepFalsifiedConstraintStrategy.
KeepNoGoodStrategy
The KeepNoGoodStrategy.
LargeCollectionManagementStrategy
The LargeCollectionManagementStrategy is the strategy used to manage large collections.
ListIndexedCollection<E>
The ListIndexedCollection adapts a List to an IndexedCollection.
Main
The Main class is the entry point for the Approximation solver.
MapDouble<K>
The MapDouble is a map that may have any type as keys, and double as values.
MapDouble.Entry<K>
A map-double entry (key-value pair).
MapDoubleAdapter<K>
The MapDoubleAdapter adapts a Map to a MapDouble.
MapInt<K>
The MapInt is a map that may have any type as keys, and int as values.
MapInt.Entry<K>
A map-int entry (key-value pair).
MapIntAdapter<K>
The MapIntAdapter adapts a Map to a MapInt.
MapToSetAdapter<E>
The MapToSetAdapter is an implementation of Set which adapts a Map.
MyISolver
Interface defining a solver with additional functionalities.
MyISolverAdapter
The Class MyISolverAdapter.
NEffectiveBacktrackingConstraintMeasure
The NEffectiveFilteringConstraintMeasureSelector.
NEffectiveFilteringConstraintMeasure
The NEffectiveFilteringConstraintMeasureSelector.
NormalStateSolver
The NormalStateSolver represents the state of the solver when performing a standard search on the original problem without any modifications or relaxations.
PathStrategy
Defines strategies for navigating and restoring solver states in an approximation solver.
Portfolio
A class that manages a portfolio of solvers running in parallel.
PortfolioFactory
A factory class for creating Portfolio objects.
RandomGroupConstraintRemover
The RandomGroupConstraintRemover.
RandomSingleConstraintRemover
The RandomSingleConstraintRemover.
RemoveOperationState
The RemoveOperationState allows to enable or disable the remove operation on an IndexedCollection.
RepeatedIndexedCollection<E>
The RepeatedIndexedCollection is an indexed collection consisting in the same element repeated multiple times.
RestartObserver
The RestartObserver.
SingleConstraintRemover
The SingleConstraintRemover.
SmallCollectionManagementStrategy
The SmallCollectionManagementStrategy is the strategy used to manage small collections.
SolverConfiguration
The SolverConfiguration class defines the configuration settings for an approximation-based solver.
SolverContext
The SolverContext class stores shared configuration settings for different solver states.
Stack<E>
The Stack defines the interface of a Last-In First-Out data structure.
StackAdapter<E>
The StackAdapter adapts a Deque to a Stack.
SubApproximationStateSolver
The SubApproximationStateSolver represents the state of the solver when performing a search on a relaxed problem.
SubIndexedCollection<E>
The SubIndexedCollection provides an unmodifiable view of a sub-part of an IndexedCollection.
SwapOperationState
The SwapOperationState allows to enable or disable the swap operation on an IndexedCollection.
UniverseSolverResult
The UniverseSolverResult represents the result returned by the solver at the end of its execution.
UnmodifiableIndexedCollection<E>
The UnmodifiableIndexedCollection is a proxy for an IndexedCollection that provides an unmodifiable view of this collection.
WdegFilteringConstraintMeasure
The WdegFilteringConstraintMeasureSelector.
XCSPParserExtension
The Class XCSPParserExtension.
